timeline.message:
Publisher#flatMapMergeSingle terminal condition race

Motivation:
Publisher#flatMapMergeSingle has the following race condition:
T1 - FlatMapSubscriber#onComplete (the outer Subscriber)
T2 - FlatMapSingleSubscriber#onComplete (the inner Subscriber)
T1 - terminal.cas(onComplete()) -> true, active == 0 -> false
T2 - active.dec() -> 0, terminal == null -> true
There is no guarantee that T2 will see the terminal.cas() from T1

Publisher#flatMapMerge was recently introduced, shares some control flow
logic with Publisher#flatMapMergeSingle that is now inconsistent.

Modifications:
- use atomic operations on the active count to flip to negative when the
outer source completes to ensure visibility on termination between
differen threads.

Result:
More correct termination of Publisher#flatMapMergeSingle
